dmca.title: [ABUSE] FA Premier League: CLub Crest infringements - FAPL_NRID11252
dmca.body:
NC


-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, February 08, 2005 11:22 AM
To: PhilS@nr-online.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] FA Premier League: CLub Crest infringements - FAPL_NRID11252

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: PhilS@nr-online.com <PhilS@nr-online.com>
To: <admin@zedge.net>
Date: Tuesday, February 8, 2005, 7:25:10 AM
Subject: [ABUSE] FA Premier League: CLub Crest infringements - FAPL_NRID11252

===8<==============Original message text===============
NetResult Internal Reference:  FAPL_NRID11252

Please quote the above FAPL_NRID11252 reference in all communications with
us regarding this issue.

We write on behalf of The FA Premier League, in respect of certain
intellectual property rights including football Club Crests.

We have noticed that your website, http://www.zedge.no  is displaying The
FA Premier League
